front.title: Threat Analysis of the GEOPRIV Protocol

abstract.t: This document provides some analysis of threats against the GEOPRIVprotocol architecture. It focuses on protocol threats, threats thatresult from the storage of data by entities in the architecture, andthreats posed by the abuse of informaion yielded by geopriv. Somesecurity properties that meet these threats are enumerated as areference for GEOPRIV requirements.
